name: roytang
text:
If I get one of each color mana myr into play, I should have an option to Form Voltron. #som #mtg

[19:40] Fun fact: Glint Hawk and Glint Hawk Idol are consecutive in the same common print run. #som #mtg

[19:41] Glint Hawk Idol sounds like a reality show where Glint Hawks compete while being criticized by Stern Judges.
